body:
"Nintendo" (which used to like his vids) apparently sent him a Cease and Desist letter demanding he stop using Nintendo references on his channels. Well apparently using the human puppets was not enough and now he said all his channels are being taken down June 1st 2021 which is tomorrow! I wish this was a joke but it's not, here's the proof! https://www.youtube.com/sml/community

I kind of wonder whether it was actually Nintendo or if it was really someone else trying to fake excuses to wipe out all remaining channels that aren't directly under the control of Google Inc. We know YouTube hates SML's guts, and in the past 2 years especially we've seen most of the old YouTubers quit (ExplodingTNT, PinkSheep), get rebranded by YouTube Inc. (SMG4), or get demonetized or terminated for no reason, to be replaced by completely obvious plants and hired YouTubers who instantly gain massive visibility with zero effort (Dream). Google probably knows SML is the last major remnant of pre-monetization YouTube, and while he too likes big bucks he's too stubborn to bend to their wishes all the time and won't make videos just to help them make more money. Everyone else who isn't part of the marketing scheme is either dead or buried below everything else and never sees the light of day, SML being one of the last survivors from the old days and they know it's not advertiser-friendly nor good for their desire to control everything like 1984.

body:
> That's probably why they want to get rid of him so bad

No, he has a channel with a kid-friendly aesthetic, yet with blatant non-kid "jokes" and is too slap stick to be enjoyed by anyone else other than children for the most part.. Channels like these a thorn in YouTube's side, as YouTube is ultimately a business. If YouTube simply wanted to delete his stuff because "old youtube" (???) don't you think they'd start purging every video from 2005-2013 with no warning?
body_html:
That's probably why they want to get rid of him so bad

Channels like these a thorn in YouTube's side, as YouTube is ultimately a business. If YouTube simply wanted to delete his stuff because "old youtube" (???) don't you think they'd start purging every video from 2005-2013 with no warning?

body:
> Have you seen the comments section on those videos? Admittedly I haven't looked at new ones in at least a few years, but still.

Yeah and it's mostly adults with some teenagers in the mix and only a couple kids. It's not even that bad aside from a couple of videos where they went overboard so who cares if kids watch it unless they start imitating Jeffy. Then that's the parent's responsibility not SML's.

> They already have.

Plenty are still up that they hate. I'll just list a couple of them:

* WatchRedditDie

* The_Cabal

* Drama

* Wuhan_Flu

* conspiracy

* PoliticalCompassMemes

* subredditcancer

* KotakuInAction

* worldpolitics

* unpopularopinion

You can't tell me with a straight face that reddit doesn't want to ban any of those.
body_html:
Have you seen the comments section on those videos? Admittedly I haven't looked at new ones in at least a few years, but still.

Yeah and it's mostly adults with some teenagers in the mix and only a couple kids. It's not even that bad aside from a couple of videos where they went overboard so who cares if kids watch it unless they start imitating Jeffy. Then that's the parent's responsibility not SML's.

They already have.

Plenty are still up that they hate. I'll just list a couple of them:

  • WatchRedditDie

  • The_Cabal

  • Drama

  • Wuhan_Flu

  • conspiracy

  • PoliticalCompassMemes

  • subredditcancer

  • KotakuInAction

  • worldpolitics

  • unpopularopinion

You can't tell me with a straight face that reddit doesn't want to ban any of those.

parent.body:
>Lots of children watch it but the majority are grown up.

Have you seen the comments section on those videos? Admittedly I haven't looked at new ones in at least a few years, but still.

>"If reddit wanted to ban all your favorite subreddits they'd have already done it!"

They already have.
parent.body_html:
Lots of children watch it but the majority are grown up.

Have you seen the comments section on those videos? Admittedly I haven't looked at new ones in at least a few years, but still.

"If reddit wanted to ban all your favorite subreddits they'd have already done it!"

They already have.

post.body:
"Nintendo" (which used to like his vids) apparently sent him a Cease and Desist letter demanding he stop using Nintendo references on his channels. Well apparently using the human puppets was not enough and now he said all his channels are being taken down June 1st 2021 which is tomorrow! I wish this was a joke but it's not, here's the proof! https://www.youtube.com/sml/community

I kind of wonder whether it was actually Nintendo or if it was really someone else trying to fake excuses to wipe out all remaining channels that aren't directly under the control of Google Inc. We know YouTube hates SML's guts, and in the past 2 years especially we've seen most of the old YouTubers quit (ExplodingTNT, PinkSheep), get rebranded by YouTube Inc. (SMG4), or get demonetized or terminated for no reason, to be replaced by completely obvious plants and hired YouTubers who instantly gain massive visibility with zero effort (Dream). Google probably knows SML is the last major remnant of pre-monetization YouTube, and while he too likes big bucks he's too stubborn to bend to their wishes all the time and won't make videos just to help them make more money. Everyone else who isn't part of the marketing scheme is either dead or buried below everything else and never sees the light of day, SML being one of the last survivors from the old days and they know it's not advertiser-friendly nor good for their desire to control everything like 1984.

post.title: SuperMarioLogan is getting terminated tomorrow!!!!!!

guild.name: Censorship

parent.body:
> Have you seen the comments section on those videos? Admittedly I haven't looked at new ones in at least a few years, but still.

Yeah and it's mostly adults with some teenagers in the mix and only a couple kids. It's not even that bad aside from a couple of videos where they went overboard so who cares if kids watch it unless they start imitating Jeffy. Then that's the parent's responsibility not SML's.

> They already have.

Plenty are still up that they hate. I'll just list a couple of them:

* WatchRedditDie

* The_Cabal

* Drama

* Wuhan_Flu

* conspiracy

* PoliticalCompassMemes

* subredditcancer

* KotakuInAction

* worldpolitics

* unpopularopinion

You can't tell me with a straight face that reddit doesn't want to ban any of those.

Yeah and it's mostly adults with some teenagers in the mix and only a couple kids. It's not even that bad aside from a couple of videos where they went overboard so who cares if kids watch it unless they start imitating Jeffy. Then that's the parent's responsibility not SML's.

They already have.

Plenty are still up that they hate. I'll just list a couple of them:

You can't tell me with a straight face that reddit doesn't want to ban any of those.
